content: this crochet basket pattern is perfect for organizing your space while adding a handmade touch to your home decor the basket is sturdy yet soft ideal for storing everything from yarn and craft supplies to toys or household items if you are familiar with by crochet patterns you know that all of my crochet patterns are inspired by nature this pattern is named after bamfield a remote community on the west coast of vancouver island in an area called barkley sound where you will find the famous broken islands #crochet #crochetbasket #freeecrochetbasketpattern #freecrochetpattern #basketcrochet #basket #crochet
